definition: surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy

sentences.english: Now you may be understandably skeptical, as we certainly were.
sentences.chinese: 现在您当然会怀疑，因为过去我们确实存有疑义。

sentences.english: A remarkable work should be enjoyed together and doubts analysed in company.
sentences.chinese: 奇文共欣赏，疑义相与析。

sentences.english: At that time, misters also passed, nobody proposes the doubt again.
sentences.chinese: 当时，老总们也都通过了，没有人再提出疑义。

sentences.english: In light of this event itself, there is no doubt that Yang Jia should be sentenced to death.
sentences.chinese: 从性质来看，杨佳被判处死刑，是没有疑义的。

sentences.english: If a plan is created, but then filed away never to be looked at until the end of the year, it is worthless.
sentences.chinese: 计划是制定了，但是到年末才去理睬是毫无疑义的。

sentences.english: Doubt the existence of objective reality should insist, not subjective.
sentences.chinese: 疑义的存在应坚持客观存在，不能主观臆断。

sentences.english: A method of knowledge reduction based on the combination of mutual information and doubtful measure is proposed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 提出一种基于互信息和疑义度相结合的知识约简方法。

sentences.english: Checking things off a To-Do list is rarely meaningful.
sentences.chinese: 检阅你“必须做”的事情清单是毫无疑义的。

definition: to discuss/to bring up various ideas for discussion
to slip/to overlook by negligence/careless omission/oversight
to counter accusations/to protest/to remonstrate/to retort/to plead/to demur/a plea (of not guilty)/a defense (against an allegation)/to enter a plea to a charge (in a law court)
